  5. #include "leveldb/iterator.h"

  7. namespace leveldb {

  9. ‌Iterator::Iterator() {
  10.   cleanup_.function = NULL;
  11.   cleanup_.next = NULL;
  12. }

  14. ‌Iterator::~Iterator() {
  15.   if (cleanup_.function != NULL) {
  16.     (*cleanup_.function)(cleanup_.arg1, cleanup_.arg2);
  17.     for (Cleanup* c = cleanup_.next; c != NULL; ) {
  18.       (*c->function)(c->arg1, c->arg2);
  19.       Cleanup* next = c->next;
  20.       delete c;
  21.       c = next;
  22.     }
  23.   }
  24. }

  26. ‌void Iterator::RegisterCleanup(CleanupFunction func, void* arg1, void* arg2) {
  27.   assert(func != NULL);
  28.   Cleanup* c;
  29.   if (cleanup_.function == NULL) {
  30.     c = &cleanup_;
  31.   } else {
  32.     c = new Cleanup;
  33.     c->next = cleanup_.next;
  34.     cleanup_.next = c;
  35.   }
  36.   c->function = func;
  37.   c->arg1 = arg1;
  38.   c->arg2 = arg2;
  39. }

  41. namespace {
  42. class EmptyIterator : public Iterator {
  43. public:
  44. ‌  EmptyIterator(const Status& s) : status_(s) { }
  45. ‌  virtual bool Valid() const { return false; }
  46. ‌  virtual void Seek(const Slice& target) { }
  47. ‌  virtual void SeekToFirst() { }
  48. ‌  virtual void SeekToLast() { }
  49. ‌  virtual void Next() { assert(false); }
  50. ‌  virtual void Prev() { assert(false); }
  51. ‌  Slice key() const { assert(false); return Slice(); }
  52. ‌  Slice value() const { assert(false); return Slice(); }
  53. ‌  virtual Status status() const { return status_; }
  54. private:
  55.   Status status_;
  56. };
  57. }  // namespace

  59. ‌Iterator* NewEmptyIterator() {
  60.   return new EmptyIterator(Status::OK());
  61. }

  63. ‌Iterator* NewErrorIterator(const Status& status) {
  64.   return new EmptyIterator(status);
  65. }

  67. }  // namespace leveldb
